subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The former South Florida coach Jim Leavitt wants his job back, insisting his dismissal after being accused of striking one of his players and then lying about the incident was unwarranted.
snippet: The former South Florida coach Jim Leavitt wants his job back, insisting his dismissal after being accused of striking one of his players and then lying about the incident was unwarranted.
